name: Ghostbusters
description: The home page for the ghostbusters - an interactive and responsive single-page MERN stack application.
technologies: MongoDB, Express, Node, React, GraphQL, Apollo Server, React Router, JWT, bcrypt

name: Flexcellent Fitness Tracker
description: A fitness tracker that allows you to track your workouts, explore new API-generated exercises, and see your progress over time.
technologies: Full Stack, JavaScript, Handlebars.js, Node.js, Express, MySQL, chart.js

name: MVC Tech Blog
description: A place where users can share their thoughts and opinions on the latest tech news and programming-related information.
technologies: Full Stack, JavaScript, Handlebars.js, Node.js, Express, MySQL

name: ORM E-Commerce Back End
description: The backend functionality of an E-commerce backend. It serves as a way to manage products, categories, and tags via an Express.js API and a MySQL database.

name: SQL Employee Tracker
description: EMS that allows company administrators to easily manage their employees, roles, and departments within a database by utilizing a suite of view, add, update, and delete database operations.

name: Get a Way to Getaway
description: A weekend getaway app that let's you find a destination within your desired driving range that suits your preferred weather conditions
